text: Mariyu i vidhanga allah vagdanam satyamani civari ghadiya niscayamani, adi ravatanlo elanti sandeham ledani telusukovataniki, a yuvakula visayam prajalaku teliyajesamu. Appudu varu (prajalu) vari (guhavasula) visayanni tisukoni parasparam vaduladukunna visayam (jnapakam cesukondi!) Varilo kondarannaru: "Vari koraku oka smaraka bhavanam nirmincali." Vari visayam vari prabhuvuke telusu. A vyavaharanlo paiceyi (prabalyam) unnavaru: "Vari smarakanga oka masjid nu nirmincali." Ani annaru
